and i tried it in game with no effect… i added it too commands.java in directory C:\Users****\Downloads\hacks\New Folder\Mezzy-Scape 508 Source V3.5\Bulby\io\packets as i could not find it anywhere else…

ok ive editied frames.java and ive removed every frozen door possible (via code 26381 and 26380) but its still in the barrows kind of blocking torag? can anyone help? “http://content.screencast.com/users/lil-rmj/folders/Jing/media/cac789a0-75d0-4856-b82a-b340e087a269/2010-03-20_1234.png” this should help for you to realise

thanks in advance !!
